name: Conrasu Weapon Understanding
summary: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself.
description:
You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself. Whenever you critically hit using a composite shortbow, glaive, longspear, longsword, shortbow, spear, or a conrasu weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.Traits

Conrasu: A people that are made of cosmic force given consciousness and housed within unique exoskeletons. Conrasus craft and use these weapons.
